questions.name: Which protocol is used to retrieve email from a mail server?
Which of the following is a feature of IPv6?
What is the main advantage of using a mesh topology?
Which protocol is used for secure data transmission over the internet?
Which device is used to connect multiple networks together?
What does the Time to Live (TTL) field in an IP packet header specify?
options: Maximum time a packet can exist in the network
The amount of time a packet takes to reach its destination
The total number of hops a packet can make
The lifespan of the data within the packet
questions.correctAnswer: Maximum time a packet can exist in the network

questions.name: What is the purpose of a subnet mask?
options: To identify the network and host portions of an IP address
questions.correctAnswer: To identify the network and host portions of an IP address

questions.name: Which layer of the OSI model is responsible for routing?
What is the function of a DNS server?
options: To convert domain names to IP addresses
To assign MAC addresses to devices
questions.correctAnswer: To convert domain names to IP addresses

questions.name: Which type of attack involves overwhelming a network with traffic?
Which of the following is a primary key?
options: A unique identifier for each record in a table
A non-unique attribute used for searching
A foreign key in a child table
questions.correctAnswer: A unique identifier for each record in a table

questions.name: Which SQL clause is used to filter records?
What is normalization in DBMS?
What is a foreign key?
options: A key that links two tables together
A unique identifier for a record
A field that can be left empty
A primary key in the same table
questions.correctAnswer: A key that links two tables together

questions.name: Which command is used to remove a table from a database?
What is a join operation in SQL?
options: Combining rows from two or more tables
Filtering records based on a condition
Grouping records by a specific column
questions.correctAnswer: Combining rows from two or more tables

questions.name: Which of the following is a NoSQL database?
What is the purpose of an index in a database?
What does ACID stand for in DBMS?
Which type of join returns all rows when there is a match in either table?
Which of the following is not a type of operating system?
What is the primary purpose of an operating system?
options: To manage computer hardware and software resources
questions.correctAnswer: To manage computer hardware and software resources

questions.name: Which of the following is a process management technique?
What is a deadlock?
options: A situation where two or more processes are unable to proceed
questions.correctAnswer: A situation where two or more processes are unable to proceed

questions.name: Which system call is used to create a new process?
What is the role of a scheduler in an operating system?
options: To determine which process runs at a given time
questions.correctAnswer: To determine which process runs at a given time

questions.name: What is virtual memory?
options: A technique that allows the execution of processes that are not completely in memory
A method to store data on the cloud
A physical extension of the main memory
questions.correctAnswer: A technique that allows the execution of processes that are not completely in memory

questions.name: Which of the following is a file management operation?
What is the purpose of the 'chmod' command in Unix/Linux?
options: To change the permissions of a file or directory
questions.correctAnswer: To change the permissions of a file or directory

questions.name: Which scheduling algorithm assigns the CPU to the process with the shortest next burst time?
What is the time complexity of binary search?
Which data structure is used for implementing recursion?
What is the space complexity of an iterative solution for the Fibonacci sequence?
Which of the following is a self-balancing binary search tree?
options: Both AVL Tree and Red-Black Tree
questions.correctAnswer: Both AVL Tree and Red-Black Tree

questions.name: What is the worst-case time complexity of Quicksort?
Which of the following is true about heap data structure?
options: Heap is a complete binary tree
Heap is a binary search tree
questions.correctAnswer: Heap is a complete binary tree

questions.name: What is the time complexity of inserting an element in a binary heap?
Which algorithm is used to find the shortest path in a graph with negative edge weights?
Which of the following sorting algorithms has the best average-case time complexity?
Which of the following is an application of Depth First Search (DFS)?
options: Finding connected components in a graph
Finding shortest path in an unweighted graph
Both Finding connected components and Topological sorting
questions.correctAnswer: Both Finding connected components and Topological sorting
